title: Quotes to Scrape
text: by Pablo Neruda (about) “If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything.” by Marilyn Monroe (about) “The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space.” by Marilyn Monroe (about) “Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up.” by James Baldwin (about) “There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.” by Jane Austen (about)
